rukus.text: qala l-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna inna hadha lasahirun ʿalimun
yuridu an yukh'rijakum min ardikum famadha tamuruna
qalu arjih wa-akhahu wa-arsil fi l-madaini hashirina
wajaa l-saharatu fir'ʿawna qalu inna lana la-ajran in kunna nahnu l-ghalibina
qalu yamusa imma an tul'qiya wa-imma an nakuna nahnu l-mul'qina
qala alqu falamma alqaw saharu aʿyuna l-nasi wa-is'tarhabuhum wajau bisih'rin ʿazimin
wa-awhayna ila musa an alqi ʿasaka fa-idha hiya talqafu ma yafikuna
fawaqaʿa l-haqu wabatala ma kanu yaʿmaluna
qala fir'ʿawnu amantum bihi qabla an adhana lakum inna hadha lamakrun makartumuhu fi l-madinati litukh'riju min'ha ahlaha fasawfa taʿlamuna
la-uqattiʿanna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilafin thumma la-usallibannakum ajmaʿina
wama tanqimu minna illa an amanna biayati rabbina lamma jaatna rabbana afrigh ʿalayna sabran watawaffana mus'limina
